responses: Hi! I am EduQuest, your Personal chatbot, What can I help you with?
Hi! I am EduQuest, your personal chatbot. What can I help you with today?

examples: Tell me about the subjects available.
responses: Our website offers various subjects including JEE-Main, JEE-Advanced, GATE, Data Structures, Algorithms, and many more. You can also access notes, sample papers, and online video lectures.

examples: Give me information about your website.
What features does your website have?
responses: Our Educational Website provides notes, sample papers, online video lectures, and courses for competitive exams like JEE-Main, JEE-Advanced, and GATE. You can also clear doubts, take quizzes, and find interview questions for placements. The website is responsive and accessible from any device.

examples: How can I clear my doubts?
I have a question. How can I ask it?
Can I get help with my doubts?
How do I submit my doubts?
responses: You can clear your doubts by sending your questions directly through our website. Our team will assist you with your queries.

examples: What topics do the quizzes cover?
responses: We have a Quiz Section with various questions on different topics. You can solve problems, view your scores, and get solutions for each question.

examples: Can you show me the projects?
responses:
Here are some projects available on our website:
1. **Digi Library**: Interactive Library Management Software (Java & MySQL)
2. **Edquest**: Educational Website (HTML, CSS & JavaScript)
3. **Photo Gallery**: Manage Personal Photos (HTML, CSS & JavaScript)
4. **Sports Fitness**: Favorite Sports Management (HTML, CSS & JavaScript)
5. **Smart TMS**: Traffic Management System (C++)

responses:

examples: What additional resources do you have?
Give me information on extra resources.
responses: We offer additional resources such as sample papers for JEE-Mains & Advanced, video lectures on various topics like Database, Computer Networks, and Engineering Mathematics, and links to educational content on different subjects. You can find these resources on our website.

What links should I check out?
responses:
Here are some quick links:
- [Projectile](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Projectile)

We offer various subjects for study including Notes, Sample Papers, Online Video Lectures and courses to crack competitive exams like JEE-Main, JEE-Advanced, GATE, etc.

Our Educational Website provides education-related resources such as Notes, Sample Papers, Online Video Lectures, and courses for competitive exams like JEE-Main, JEE-Advanced, GATE, etc. We also have Quizzes, Interview questions, and Projects for students.
Students can clear their doubts by sending their questions to our website. We will provide the necessary help to clear your doubts.
Quiz Section is an interesting feature for students which provides them with lots of questions. They can view their scores easily and solutions to every question.
We have added a project section where students from schools and colleges can get projects for the final year and Class 12th Board Projects. It is completely responsive to provide a smooth experience.

We offer various courses including:
1. **Java** - [Watch Here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IsLyduxZ9sc&list=PLX9Zi6XTqOKQ7TdRz0QynGIKuMV9Q2H8E)
